name: AmazingHorrorMachine
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amazing horror machine
des:
***************************************
Amazing Horror Machine will scare you badly.
Hold your heart and heart beat before opening it. (Haha kidding, open the app, use it and tell us if you need more scare sound.)

Using instruction :
Alexa, Open amazing horror machine
Alexa, ask amazing horror machine to scare me
Alexa, ask amazing horror machine to be horrible
Alexa, ask amazing horror machine to make fear
Alexa, ask amazing horror machine to make scare
Alexa, ask amazing horror machine to make me afraid
Alexa, ask amazing horror machine to play horror sound
Alexa, ask amazing horror machine to make horror

***************************************
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
